body.p: To His Excellency Thomas E Bramlett Govenor of Kentucky

The undersigned petitioners citizens of Lawrence County Ky would respectfully represent that at the Last term of the Lawrence Circuit Court in October last an indictment was made, against Jno Copley for the murder of John Williamson, the facts of which case are as we verily believe that the said John Williamson was a notorious thief and Gurilla, had robbed many of the homes, wives and children of the Union men whilst they were engaged in the defence of their country and very many of the good citizens were greatly injured and outraged by this man Williamson and when he was captured he was
shot not as we believe by Copley but by some one else and the opinion prevails that it was some one now engaged in the prosecution of this case Copley was a Home Guard in West Virginia and the witnesses for him are Virginians and he does not nor do we believe he can get their attendance at Court we further represent that Capt. Ira Copley is a good citizen has always been respected and we unhesitatingly say that Copley would not comitte murder. we therefore pray your Excellency to pardon said Copley- of the offense charged in said Indictment
